H0.text: Eating plants or organisms is how animals obtain nitrogen.

H1.text: Eating plants or sediments is how animals obtain nitrogen.

H2.text: Eating plants and other animals is how animals obtain nitrogen.

H3.text: Eating plants or bugs is how animals obtain nitrogen.

A4.text: While many animals, fungi, and other heterotrophic organisms obtain nitrogen by ingestion of amino acids, nucleotides, and other small organic molecules
